name: Aqua Snap!
description:
You are captaining a high-tech deep sea submarine with a task to picture beasts that lurk within. Dive deep and return with photos and fame will surely follow!

A small game playable in browser. Move mouse to move around. Turn searchlight with Button 1 and Button 2. Take pictures with Middle button. There are 3 different kind of fish to find.

Made with Godot 3.3 for Ludum Dare 48 with theme "Deeper and Deeper" by Leo Jämsä and Artturi Kivelä.
